title: Please calm down with the music.
body: Riot, I'm sure we'd all appreciate it if you stopped mastering your music to make our ears bleed when we update and forget to turn your application down to 9% in the mixer.  Just a thought.  And champion select is the worst in this regard.

replies.body:
What.

It is all fairly well balanced, sounds like personal volume setting problems..
Yes it's balanced, I'm referring to the fact that my personal volume settings get reset every patch and take the music back to +20 dB.
Hey Sparky - are you playing on the new League Client or the AIR client?
